title: THIS IS THE MOST EPIC FIGHT IN ONE PIECE!! Law vs Vergo - One Piece Episode 615, 616 & 617 Reaction
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction video covering episodes 615-617 focusing on the Law vs Vergo fight that occurs during this arc. The reactor describes this as one of the most epic fights in One Piece.
